name: opentransportdata.swiss
description: The data catalogue pages appear in a new layout and on a new platform with the subdomain https://data.opentransportdata.swiss, providing data records on a cloud-based platform from 8 January 2025. The platform offers mobility, public transport, and other related data sets, including GTFS, real-time information, road traffic data, charging stations, shared mobility, park & rail, and more.
owner_name: Swiss Public Transport Sector (Swiss Federal Government, Transport Operators, and Partners)
